verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a tweet Thursday morning] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: both leaders will “ try to make it a very special moment for World Peace] ! ”
In a tweet Thursday morning , Trump said both leaders [V: will] “ try to make it a very special moment for World Peace ! ”
In a tweet Thursday morning , Trump said [ARG0: both leaders] [ARGM-MOD: will] “ [V: try] [ARG1: to make it a very special moment for World Peace] ! ”
